results.content:
1- no tutorial or support document for the Hadoop installation.
2- The clarity of the English language is 8 of 10.
3- no deep explanation of examples.

theoretically is good and contains valuable information. but practically, the course is for who have pre-knowledge of Hadoop and already dealt with.

results.content:
pre-requisite: You need hadoop installed and running. shouldn't be hard to include this on the course

Very repetitive, first 2hrs explain the exact same concept multiple times, with the same words, seems like instructors is just trying to fill content. next hours can be reduced by half at least, lots of repetition.

Back noise as interference multiple times across lots of videos. Like when a message/calls comes in to a phone that interferes with the audio.

Lot of Old hadoop used (JobTracker),

16.3.1: writing in paint with the mouse, extremely hard to follow. Lack of preparation?

23.3.8: First hands-on session: Video of Code recorded has bad quality, had to read, no attachment with it either

50.5.16:  Diagram on paint with the mouse, this should be prepared before creating the video with a more friendly tool

Not easy to follow the English

results.content: The English is very hard to follow. Also, it would be nice to provide a copy of the slides, because some parts of the video have some "lags" on it, so it makes the whole thing even harder to follow.
